participant_1.background:
I loved listening to the music of VV Nation with my dad when I was a kid.
i know how to count cards in blackjack.
i love going to the gym.
I have my priorities straight and don't feel the need to impress others.
I just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure that my ethnic background is relevant to my current situation.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
i like to hunt for my food.
I like to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian trail.
i like rollerblading.

content.text: Hello! I just finished baking my famous chocolate chip cookies, how are you doing?
Hi! I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am currently at work, I am a caretaker for elderly people.
That is really nice of you. I am sure they appreciate you. I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
I like to hunt for my food. Do you like to cook?
Yes, I love to cook! I just got done baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies. What is your favorite food?
I love rollerblading! Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I love going to the gym and counting cards in blackjack.
I have never heard of counting cards in blackjack. How do you do that?
It is actually a very easy skill to learn. You just have to pay attention to what cards have been played and you can count the odds of what card will come next
